nappo.core.envs package¶

Submodules¶

nappo.core.envs.create_vector_environments module¶

nappo.core.envs.create_vector_environments.make_env(env_fn, env_kwargs, index_worker, index_env, log_dir=None, info_keywords=(), mode='train')¶

Returns a function that handles the creating of a single environment, so it can be executed in an independent thread.

env_fnfunc

Function to create the environment.

env_kwargsdict

keyword arguments of env_fn.

log_dirstr

Target path for bench.Monitor logger values.

info_keywordstuple

Information keywords to be logged stored by bench.Monitor.

index_workerint

Index of the worker running this environment.

index_envint

Index of this environment withing the vector of environments.

modestr

“train” or “test”

_thunkfunc

A function to create and return the environment. It also sets up the Monitor logging and used a TransposeImage wrapper if environment obs are images.

nappo.core.envs.create_vector_environments.vec_envs_factory(env_fn, env_kwargs, num_processes, log_dir=None, info_keywords=())¶

Returns a function to create a vector of environments of size num_processes, so it can be executed by any worker, remote or not.

env_fnfunc

Function to create the environment.

env_kwargsdict

keyword arguments of env_fn.

num_processesint

size of the vector of environments.

log_dirstr

Target path for envs to log information through bench.Monitor class.

info_keywordstuple

Information keywords to be logged stored by bench.Monitor class.

make_vec_envfunc

Function to create a vector of environments.

dummy_env.action_spacegym.Space

Environments action space.

dummy_env.observation_space: gym.Space

Environments observation space.

nappo.core.envs.env_wrappers module¶

class nappo.core.envs.env_wrappers.TransposeImage(env=None, op=[2, 0, 1])¶

Bases: gym.core.ObservationWrapper

When environment observations are images, this wrapper allows to transpose the axis. It is useful when the images have shape (W,H,C), as they can be transposed “on the fly” to (C,W,H) for PyTorch convolutions to be applied.

envgym.Env

Original Gym environment, previous to applying the wrapper.

oplist

New axis ordering.

oplist

New axis ordering.

observation_spacegym.Space

New observation space

observation(ob)¶

Transpose observation

nappo.core.envs.vector_wrappers module¶

class nappo.core.envs.vector_wrappers.VecPyTorch(venv, device)¶

Bases: baselines.common.vec_env.vec_env.VecEnvWrapper

This wrapper turns obs, reward’s and done’s from numpy arrays to pytorch tensors and places them in the specified device, facilitating interaction between the environment and the actor critic function approximators (NNs).

venvVecEnv

Original vector environment, previous to applying the wrapper.

devicetorch.device

CPU or specific GPU where obs, reward’s and done’s are placed after being transformed into pytorch tensors.

devicetorch.device

CPU or specific GPU where obs, reward’s and done’s are placed after being transformed into pytorch tensors.

num_envsint

Size of vector environment.

reset()¶

New vec env reset function

step_async(actions)¶

New vec env step_async function

step_wait()¶

New vec env step_wait function
